transcript.title: SCHOOL SHOOTINGS IN DENVER, USA
transcript.content:
I have today sent the following message of condolence to President

Clinton:

Dear Bill

I was deeply shocked to hear of the tragic shooting in Denver. Australians

are horrified at this wanton act of terrorism. We feel for the families

left bereaved and, on behalf of the Government and people of Australia,

I convey our deepest sympathy and condolences to you and the American

people.

Yours sincerely

(John Howard)

The Hon. William J Clinton

President of the United States of America

21 April 1999
